West End Jungle is a 1961 British film directed by Arnold Louis Miller and starring Andria Lawrence and Vicki Woolf. It focuses on the issue of prostitution.Simon Sheridan, Keeping the British End Up: Four Decades of Saucy Cinema, Titan Books 2011. pp. 45–46.
